tadımlık bi oyun indirimdeyken hemen alın

Bardzo dobra gra, grafika niby ziemniakowa, ale nie boli w oczy.
Przydatna też do grania w gmoda (w ttt i na niektórych mapach jest wymagany)
Za cene zwykłą nie polecam, ale na przecenie oczywiście.
Este un joc foarte bun si cu o configratie buna,il recomand.
比GO还好的画面和物理效果，真的是惊艳，怪不得在04年时这款游戏是显卡杀手，这也是这款游戏没火起来的原因之一，S的僵尸乐园是真的好玩，比某F强，而且1.6、零点和S这么长时间都不鬼服，可见它们的魅力，如果GO走竞技性，那么我希望起源2能够走真实性，9102年了，如果V社能在起源2做出它们真正的实力，再一次成为显卡杀手（我的期盼：GO和起源2，一个硬核竞技，一个有趣真实，服务两种不同的玩家）。
спасибо папаша за эту игру чернава цвета 21 века

Stary dobry counter-strike:Source polecam każdemu kto nie kupił

Hello all. I was thinking, what i can write about this game. In this game, is more friendly people. This is no matter: Germans, Russians, Polish, or someone, who talk in English language. Much more friendly people than in CS:GO. Here i never met a scream,
when i die last, and team loose game by me. More cultural people. Ofcourse, sometimes kids is happend here too, but not to many. When i publish this post i have 13.6 hours total playing, and noone has scream on me :D. Maybe just i v got lucky, i don't know.

- This game was few years before CS:GO, so here are this same maps, which are in CS:GO. If you are looking game to play, where is not much screaming kids, this game is probably for you.
这在一款好游戏，最舒服的是没遇到外挂：）
